title: HOUR 1 - Chicago Bears, Albert Breer
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Chicago Bears, Albert Breer
description:
In todays epsiode, Colin applauds the Chicago Bears for finally trading Roquan Smith and looking to build their future. The Green Bay Packers seem to be in limbo not knowing what they should do at the trade deadline. Albert Breer joins to talk Packers, Lions and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
